FuncDef: The display event information command displays specified or all event information. The display event information command displays specified or all event information.

ParaDef.Info:
The name of event.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo: To view specified event information or information about all events in the system, such as the event name and level, run the display event information command.
